snippet.title: Reverse: 1999 - Official Pre-Registration Trailer
snippet.description:
Reverse: 1999 is a mobile narrative-driven time-travel adventure RPG developed by Bluepoch. Players will embody a Timekeeper named Verinwho goes on an adventure through a strange alternate history full of familiar events twisted by magic and mystery. Assemble your arcanists and battle against otherworldly monsters, rival factions, and more in turn-based tactical combat. The game features a vast cast of characters voiced fully in English with diverse accents and dialects from across time and space. Reverse: 1999 is available for pre-registration now on iOS, Android, and PC.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
